p: For further analysis of antiviral effects of compound #7, we investigated effects of compound #7 treatment on levels of integrated proviral DNA and cellular viral proteins and mRNAs in LC5-RIC cells, under conditions fully inhibiting HIV production (Fig. 3). Treatments were also performed with compounds #4 or #18, which are at least 400-fold less active against HIV than compound #7 (Supplementary Table S1) as negative compound controls.
